TimeSensitiveLogic: No time-sensitive logic is present in this contract.

ConditionalLogicPaths.BonusClaimCondition: The getFirstWithdrawalBonus function includes a conditional path based on claimedBonus to prevent multiple claims, though this check can be bypassed due to reentrancy.
ConditionalLogicPaths.TransferSuccessCondition: The withdrawReward function includes a require(success) condition to ensure the token transfer completes successfully.
